text: Tengban Mapuna koubikhraba makhoina Tengban Mapuna wasakpikhiba lomnaidaba yaipha thoujalsing adu phangnabagidamak Christtana anouba walepnabagi sillangbiba adu oibire. Masi touba yabagi maramdi ahanba walepnabagi makhada leiringei matamda misingna toukhiba aranbasing adudagi ningtamhanbinaba sibikhiba ama leikhiba adunani.
